item_empty_crate.name: Empty Crate
item_empty_crate.description: A sturdy wooden crate, currently empty.

item_bent_coin.name: Bent Coin
item_bent_coin.description: A copper coin, bent almost in half. Worthless now.

item_strange_feather.name: Strange Feather
item_strange_feather.description: A large, iridescent feather unlike any bird you know.

item_rusty_lantern.name: Rusty Lantern
item_rusty_lantern.description: An old iron lantern, rusted and without fuel.

item_guano.name: Pile of Guano
item_guano.description: A large pile of bat droppings. Smells awful, but might be useful as fertilizer.

item_stone_fragment.name: Carved Stone Fragment
item_stone_fragment.description: A piece of stone broken from a larger structure, bearing part of an intricate carving.

item_broken_stylus.name: Broken Stylus
item_broken_stylus.description: An intricate stylus made of bone, now broken in two.

item_old_campfire.name: Old Campfire Ashes
item_old_campfire.description: The cold ashes of a small campfire.

item_lizard_scale.name: Large Scale
item_lizard_scale.description: A tough, greenish scale, likely shed by a large lizard.

item_wool_tuft.name: Tuft of Wool
item_wool_tuft.description: A small tuft of sheep's wool caught on the fence.

item_goblin_ear.name: Goblin Ear
item_goblin_ear.description: A severed goblin ear. Grim, but maybe someone collects these.

item_wolf_pelt.name: Wolf Pelt
item_wolf_pelt.description: The furry pelt of a wolf.

item_wolf_fang.name: Wolf Fang
item_wolf_fang.description: A sharp fang taken from a wolf.

item_rat_tail.name: Rat Tail
item_rat_tail.description: The long, scaly tail of a giant rat.

item_rat_fur.name: Rat Fur
item_rat_fur.description: A patch of mangy rat fur.

item_stolen_pouch.name: Stolen Pouch
item_stolen_pouch.description: A small leather pouch, likely stolen.

item_troll_hide.name: Troll Hide
item_troll_hide.description: A thick, tough piece of troll hide.

item_shiny_rock.name: Shiny Rock
item_shiny_rock.description: A mundane rock that happens to be shiny. Trolls like shiny things.
